short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Put time-wasting websites in a vault and press the extension icon to unlock it for a period of time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Put time-wasting websites in a vault and press the extension icon to unlock it for a period of time. Pick between a whitelist or blacklist, a blacklist locks the websites listed while a whitelist locks every website but the ones listed. Then type in the websites you want locked/unlocked and put in the amount of unlocked time.
